publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7784 Kenneth Gibson: Irvine’s Bakers, World Scotch Pie Champions—That the Parliament congratulates Maurice Irvine and all of the staff at Irvine’s Bakery on winning this year’s Scotch Pie World Championship; applauds Mr Irvine’s perseverance, having finished in second, third and fourth place over a period of 11 years; recognises the contribution of Irvine’s bakery to the local community and economy, with three shops, a production unit and a café all located in the Garnock Valley and employing 45 people; further recognises the traditions and longevity of Irvine’s Bakery, which was founded by Maurice’s great-grandfather, Thomas, in the 1920s; believes that this award will come as a welcome boost to the business as people travel from around the country to sample the best Scotch pie in the world, and wishes Mr Irvine and his staff continued success in years ahead. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Bob Doris*, Stewart Maxwell*, Alasdair Allan*
S3M-7784 Irvine’s Bakers, World Scotch Pie Champions (lodged on 25 January 2011) Stuart McMillan*, Jamie Hepburn*, Brian Adam*
S3M-7784 Irvine’s Bakers, World Scotch Pie Champions (lodged on 25 January 2011) John Wilson*, Joe FitzPatrick*

Supported by: Bill Kidd, Bob Doris, Stewart Maxwell, Alasdair Allan, Stuart McMillan, Jamie Hepburn, Brian Adam, John Wilson, Joe FitzPatrick
